Description_lang: Feral: Ferocious Bite now refreshes the duration of your Rip on targets with $s2% or less health.Guardian: Reduces the rage cost of your Savage Defense by ${$m1/-10}.

name_blz.en_US: Item - Druid T13 Feral 2P Bonus (Savage Defense and Blood In The Water)
name_blz.es_MX: Item - Druid T13 Feral 2P Bonus (Savage Defense and Blood In The Water)
name_blz.pt_BR: Item - Bônus 2P T13 de Druida Feral (Defesa Selvagem e Sangue na Água)
name_blz.en_GB: Item - Druid T13 Feral 2P Bonus (Savage Defense and Blood In The Water)
name_blz.es_ES: Item - Druid T13 Feral 2P Bonus (Savage Defense and Blood In The Water)
name_blz.it_IT: Oggetto - Druido T13 Ferino 2P Bonus (Difesa Selvaggia e Fiume di Sangue)
name_blz.ko_KR: 아이템 - 드루이드 T13 야성 2P 보너스 (야생의 방어 및 먹이 포착)
name_blz.zh_TW: 物品:德魯伊T13野性2P獎勵(兇蠻防禦及水中之血)
name_blz.zh_CN: Item - Druid T13 Feral 2P Bonus (Savage Defense and Blood In The Water)

description_blz.en_US:
Feral: Ferocious Bite now refreshes the duration of your Rip on targets with 60% or less health.
Guardian: Reduces the rage cost of your Savage Defense by 5.
description_blz.es_MX:
Feral: Ahora Mordedura feroz reinicia la duración de Destripar sobre los objetivos con un 60% o menos de salud.
Guardián: Reduce el costo de ira de tu Defensa salvaje 5 p.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Feral: Mordida Feroz agora renova a duração de Rasgar em alvos com 60% de vida ou menos.
Guardião: reduz o custo de raiva da Defesa Selvagem em 5.
description_blz.de_DE:
Wildheit: 'Wilder Biss' erneuert jetzt die Dauer von 'Zerfetzen' bei Zielen mit 60% oder weniger Gesundheit.
Wächter: Verringert die Wutkosten für 'Wilde Verteidigung' um 5.
description_blz.en_GB:
Feral: Ferocious Bite now refreshes the duration of your Rip on targets with 60% or less health.
Guardian: Reduces the rage cost of your Savage Defense by 5.
description_blz.es_ES:
Feral: Ahora Mordedura feroz reinicia la duración de Destripar sobre los objetivos con un 60% o menos de salud.
Guardián: Reduce el coste de ira de tu Defensa salvaje 5 p.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Combat farouche : Morsure féroce réinitialise la durée de Déchirure sur les cibles disposant de 60% ou moins de leurs points de vie.
Gardian : Réduit le coût en rage de votre Défense sauvage de 5.
description_blz.it_IT:
Aggressore Ferino: Morso Feroce ora rinnova la durata di Squarcio sui bersagli con il 60% o meno di salute.
Guardiano Ferino: riduce il costo in rabbia di Difesa Selvaggia di 5.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Сила зверя: при использовании "Свирепого укуса" обновляется время действия эффекта "Разорвать", если уровень здоровья цели составляет менее 60%.
Страж: стоимость "Дикой защита" снижена на 5 ед. ярости.
description_blz.ko_KR:
야성: 흉포한 이빨이 생명력이 60% 이하인 대상에게 도려내기의 지속시간을 갱신합니다.
수호: 야생의 방어에 소비되는 분노가 5만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
野性：兇猛撕咬現在可以重置你的撕扯在生命力處於60%或更低的目標身上的持續時間。
守護者：使你的兇蠻防禦的怒氣消耗降低5點。
description_blz.zh_CN:
野性：当你用凶猛撕咬攻击一个生命值不高于其最大生命值60%的目标时，可以刷新你在该目标身上的割裂持续时间。
防御：野蛮防御所消耗的怒气值降低5点。
